name: BoopleJoop
description:
BoopleJoop is an interplanetary matching game made for Ludum Dare 38, with the theme "Small World". Match the identical Booples and create a unique world for them to live in!

Created by OnionBlaze and Zivendrel.

Ludum Dare Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/booplejoop

Controls:

A-Z Keys: Select/Unselect the corresponding Boople on the screen.
